mapper.insert: insert into t_area_info (index_id, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name, ex_status) values (#{indexId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_area_info set province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_name = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ex_status = #{exStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where index_id = #{indexId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select index_id, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name, ex_status from t_area_info where index_id = #{indexId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select index_id, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name, ex_status from t_area_info
